summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 GMC CANYON. WHILE DRIVING AT AN UNKNOWN SPEED, THE STEERING FAILED AND THE POWER STEERING AND STABILITY WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. THE CONTACT CALLED A LOCAL DEALER (SHARRETT BUICK GMC, LOCATED AT 10312 AUTO PL HAGERSTOWN, MD 21740). THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE AND PROVIDED CASE NUMBER: 8-3174680341. NO FURTHER ASSISTANCE WAS OFFERED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 44,000.
